request.name: :id
request.comment: REQUIRED String. The ID of the List in the database.

request.name: Authorization
request.comment: REQUIRED Provide this header with Bearer <user token> to gain authorized access to this API method.

request.name: max_id
request.comment: Internal parameter. Use HTTP Link header for pagination.

request.name: since_id
request.comment: Internal parameter. Use HTTP Link header for pagination.

request.name: min_id
request.comment: Internal parameter. Use HTTP Link header for pagination.

request.name: limit
request.comment: Integer. Maximum number of results. Defaults to 40 accounts. Max 80 accounts. Set to 0 in order to get all accounts without pagination.
